subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
I hope this letter finds you in a convenient condition.
I represent a financial company and we are currently expanding our investment portfolio in production and distribution outside our region in the following sectors, Oil/Gas, construction, Real Estate, Stock Speculation and Mining, Transportation, Health Sector and Tobacco, Communication Services, Agriculture Forestry & fishery, information technology, Education, infrastructure, telecommunications, financial services, agrobusiness, Etc.
We are also interested in Debt Financing/Loan. We also pay 1-percent commission to brokers, who introduce project owners for finance or other opportunities.
If you're interested, we shall give details upon response.
Best regards,
Mr. Kamer Mehmet.
Secretary General of the Investment Funding.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Kamer Mehmet,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm always interested in learning about investment opportunities. Could you please provide more details about the sectors you mentioned? Specifically, what kind of projects are you looking to invest in within the Oil Gas, Real Estate, Stock and Mining, Health Sector, Tobacco, Services, Forestry fishery, Education, and financial services?

Additionally, could you explain how the Debt Financing Loan works? What are the terms and conditions associated with it?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Ms Carol

Your email message was received and acknowledged.

Here are the full details of our proposal and proceedings so I urge you to
read carefully and respond accordingly. I’m the assistant secretary general
for Global Financial Investment in Turkey .

We invite you to partner with us and benefit in our new Loan and Project
funding referral program. We provide investment capital for companies to
finance their business or viable projects using our alternative finance
structure without the usual rigorous and stringent conditions experienced
in banks and some other lending institutions.

Through our alternative finance structure clients will have interest rate
fixed at 2% per annum on investment capital or bridge finance given
proposed tenure for the loan, so we are interested in funding

    * Start up * Business Acquisition
    * Business Expansion * Commercial Real Estate acquisition
    * Renewable energy project * Bridge loan
    * Mining & agricultural projects

We advise you to revert to us for further discussions on your  business
interest.

regards,

Mr. Kamer Mehmet
Assistant Secretary General
of the Investment Funding


Thu, Feb 8, 2024 at 5:50 PM Carol <gi26950@***.com> wrote:

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Kamer Mehmet,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this proposal. I am interested in learning more about your Loan and Project funding referral program. Could you please provide me with some additional details?

1. What are the specific conditions and requirements for companies to qualify for investment capital through your finance structure?
2. How does your interest rate compare to traditional banks and lending institutions?
3. Can you give me an example of a successful project that has been funded through your program?
4. Are there any limitations on the types of businesses or projects that can be considered for funding?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Carol, (Our Detailed Email, Please. Read Very Carefully)

I sincerely appreciate your swift response and interest to communicate with
me which shows how ready you are to proceed.

However, I can understand by going through your brief mail, I know  you are
professionally skilled in business so I also need to know the best
 strategy we can approach the matter.

To that effect I wish to explain in detail that we are a Turkey based
investment company. We are currently interested in financing projects in
need of a loan at 2% interest annually. There are no sector or regional
restrictions/limits to projects we receive, review and approve to finance.


Below is our standard business practice.

Minimum and maximum Funding: $1 Million to $300 Billion USD
Placement Opens to: Entrepreneurs, Corporations and Investors
Funding Type: Loan Investment
Funding Rate: 2% Interest Rate per annum
Term: 2-10 years   Repayment/ Renewable tenure
Collateral: We will use the Due Diligence Document that you will send to us
to secure an insurance bond policy that will represent the collateral for
the funding but it will be our responsibility not yours.
Grace Period: We offer a maximum of 12 months grace period before the
borrower starts paying interest.
Disbursement: Loan is disbursed in full amount to the borrower's project
Bank account.
Prepayment Penalties: There is no prepayment penalty associated with the
funding.

If our standard business practice is OK with you and based on the above
information, we shall be glad to receive your executive summary / business
plan with projected cash flow analysis in a compatible format (PDF
-recommended) for our review and consideration in time.

If there is more information you need to learn about us please feel free to
contact us.
Best regards,

Mr. Kamer Mehmet
Secretary General
of the Investment Funding

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Kamer Mehmet,

Thank you for sharing the detailed information about your Turkey-based investment company and the financing projects you are interested in. I appreciate your transparency in explaining your standard business practice.

Could you please provide more details on the specific types of projects or industries that your company typically finances? Additionally, could you elaborate on the process of securing the insurance bond policy as collateral for funding?

I look forward to learning more about how we can potentially collaborate on a project. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Ms Carol
Thank you for your email.
My last email is well detailed prior to your last email/questions. However,
please read below once again.

"We will use a Due Diligence Document that you will send to us to secure an
insurance bond policy that will represent the collateral for the funding."

Secondly, we finance all viable projects irrespective of region/country.
Kindly send us your business plan or executive summary with projected cash
flow analysis for our review and consideration in time.

We appreciate your cooperation.
regards
Mr. Kamer Mehmet

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Kamer Mehmet,

Thank you for providing more details about the process. I appreciate your thorough explanation. Could you please clarify what specific information you require in the business plan or executive summary? Additionally, do you have a preferred format for these documents?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Carol
Your email is appreciated.
Following your question, which I have explained everything you need to know
about the loan process, it is with keen regard to inform you that you ought
to have known what I meant by business plan or executive summary. Also, I
stated in one of my last correspondence that the recommended preferred
format is through PDF.

We will appreciate your response along with the above requested information.
regards
Mr. Kamer Mehmet

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Kamer Mehmet,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you have provided about the loan process and the preferred format for documents. Could you please clarify what specific details are required in the business plan or executive summary? I want to ensure that I provide all the necessary information in my response.

Looking forward to your guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Carol
